de.icongmbh.oss.maven.plugin.javassist.example.transformer

Class MethodCallClassTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.icongmbh.oss.maven.plugin.javassist.ClassTransformer
      • de.icongmbh.oss.maven.plugin.javassist.example.transformer.MethodCallClassTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javassist.build.IClassTransformer

    public class MethodCallClassTransformer
extends ClassTransformer
    Example of ClassTransformer implementation.

    This example shows a full functional implementation of an ClassTransformer.
    The transformer inject bytecode around configurable method calls. 

     

 <transformerClass>
  <className>
    de.icongmbh.oss.maven.plugin.javassist.example.transformer.MethodCallClassTransformer
  </className>
  <properties>
    <property>
      <name>my.example.App#doSomthing</name>
      <value>{ $2="injected value for sec. parameter"; $_ = $proceed($$); }</value>
    </property>
  </properties>
 </transformerClass>
    Since:
    1.1.0
    See Also:
    https://jboss-javassist.github.io/javassist/tutorial/tutorial2.html#before

      • configure

        public void configure(Properties properties)
               throws Exception

        Properties entries like the following.

        • name: full qualified class name and method name separated by '#'
        • value: Javassist statement - starts with '{' and ends with '}' 
         
   my.example.App#doSomthing={ $2="injected value for sec. parameter"; $_ = $proceed($$); }

        configure in class ClassTransformer
